title: A Piney Woods Christmas
description: Set deep in the Piney Woods of East Texas Angel is orphaned as a young child. Having been raised by an Indian Elder she learns what it means for family to not always be related by blood, but rather by love. When a terrible ice storm takes her husband, she is left alone to learn how to create a new life for herself and her children without him. Less than a year after his death she is faced with yet another ice storm which nearly destroys the entire town. How will she restore the Spirit of Christmas to the Piney Woods while she is about to bring another child into the world? She is paid a visit by the spirit of her husband to help her move on without him, while creating a new life for more than her own children.
author: Eilish Hawes-Fraser
